>First Panorama Attempt

17 Dec 2009


First Panorama Attempt
Originally uploaded by Benjamin Blundell
I've been loaned a 10.5mm Nikon Lens with a panoramic mount. It seems like a lot of fun but before I go totally wild with it I figured I'd do some test shots indoors to see how it works. I think the beauty of Panoramas is in the viewing though; they don't seem too interesting when presented flat like this.
